message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a chance to purchase my product for $11,500. I believe this price reflects its true value and presents a great opportunity for you.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to stay within my budget.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $10,000 is significantly below my asking price. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $10,750?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. How about $10,500? I'm willing to compromise, but I need to stay within my limits.
